TopicTitle: What is the Purple Marker on the Nav Ball

Articles.Content:
I\'ve been playing for a while now, but for the life of me I can\'t figure out what the purple icon on the nav ball is for. I feel like it might be useful (why else would it be there).

So, anyone know what it is?
Not as helpful as I hopped then. Ah well, now I now. Thanks!

Alternatively, if you\'re within 50km (IIRC) of some other craft or piece of debris in orbit, it\'ll point at that instead. I agree, pointing at KSC isn\'t too useful, but the debris-finder certainly is if you ever ant to rendezvous or something.

Not as helpful as I hopped then. Ah well, now I now. Thanks!

It\'s quite helpful for a smooth landing point... If you\'re interested in planes...
